duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct medical history evaluation and physical abilities assessment of patients to develop treatment plans.
Plan and administer prescribed skilled physical therapy treatment and training for patients.
Confer with physician and clinical team members to obtain additional patient information and assist in developing, implementing, and revising the therapy treatment program.
Provide instructions and care plans for Physical Therapy Assistants and Home Health Aide staff and supervise/evaluate their performance.
Accurately and promptly document patients' care observations, interventions, and evaluations.
Report patient's progress to the patient's physician, Clinical Manager, staff, patient, and family.

education_certification.credential: Degree from an accredited Physical Therapy Program (approved by the APTA)
Current and unrestricted Physical Therapy license
Valid driver’s license, auto insurance, and reliable transportation
